name: NVDA: Custom thesis
headline: NVDA: AI demand will lead to and increase in demand for company products, thus increasing the price of their stock
description: AI demand will lead to and increase in demand for company products, thus increasing the price of their stock

claims.rationale: Growth should stay positive in the base case.
Business should produce positive free cash flow.
Valuation should not be extremely stretched versus cash generation.
Avoid severe negative headline shock over the last 30 days.
Regulatory pressure should not spike in the last 30 days.
Insurance-related negative headlines should not spike in the last 30 days.
Labor-related negative headlines should not spike in the last 30 days.
